explains: adj. 杠杆的；杠杆作用的
v. （美）杠杆式投机，举债经营（leverage 的过去分词形式）
wordGroup: leveraged buyout [经]融资收买；融资买入

sentences.en: In fact, the concept of reuse has been well understood and leveraged right from the day of object orientation (OO).
sentences.cn: 事实上，重用的概念从面向对象（OO）诞生的那天起就已经被人们很好的理解并应用。

sentences.en: Collateralized loan obligations are backed primarily by leveraged bank loans.
sentences.cn: 贷款抵押债券主要由银行杠杆贷款支持。

sentences.en: As consumers leveraged up, so did companies.
sentences.cn: 当消费者大肆举债时，企业同样如此。
